MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL40 postcode area of Dolgellau affecting properties in Lion Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  1:49PM. Our engineers have arrived on site are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:08PM on 20th January 2021.
